title: How to Find the Bombers in Zelda Majora's Mask

steps.title: Travel to northern Clock Town.
steps.content: Travel to northern Clock Town. You'll find a little kid shooting at a balloon (holy cow, it has Majora's Mask on it!) and speak to him. If you're normal Link, he'll just speak to you, but if you're Deku Link, you'll have to get a magic meter from the Great Fairy and pop the balloon. He'll talk to you and then line up his friends for a game of hide and seek.

steps.title: The first kid is behind the tree near the slide.
steps.content: The first kid is behind the tree near the slide. He should be easy enough to catch.

steps.title: The second Bomber is in Western Clock Town.
steps.content: The second Bomber is in Western Clock Town. Walk up the stairs in the little empty area.

steps.title: The third Bomber is hidden in Eastern Clock Town.
steps.content: The third Bomber is hidden in Eastern Clock Town. Transform into Deku Link and jump into the flower. Land on the roof of the Stock Pot Inn.

steps.title: Before you leave East Clock Town, go up the stairs by the alley to find the fourth Bomber (he's holding a cuckoo) and catch him.
steps.content: Before you leave East Clock Town, go up the stairs by the alley to find the fourth Bomber (he's holding a cuckoo) and catch him.

steps.title: Go back to Northern Clock Town and look by the tree next to the fence.
steps.content: Go back to Northern Clock Town and look by the tree next to the fence. That's all the Bombers!
